description: A legendary black blade and one of the 21 Great Grade swords. Shusui was originally wielded by the legendary samurai Ryuma before Zoro won it from his zombie form. The blade is noted for its exceptional durability and the fact that it cannot be damaged due to being a black blade.
significance: One of Zoro's most important weapons throughout the series, symbolizing his growing strength and reputation as a swordsman.
properties: Heavier than normal swords, increasing cutting power
Historically belonged to the legendary samurai Ryuma

keyMoments.title: Zoro's First Combat Use of Shusui
keyMoments.description: Zoro uses Shusui in battle for the first time against Oars, testing the legendary blade's capabilities in actual combat.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of Shusui's use as one of Zoro's primary weapons.
